description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Microsoft Streaming Service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30090):

1. Download and apply the appropriate KB update based on your system's build version from the links below.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure that all changes are effectively applied.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability could allow an attacker to gain elevated privileges, thus potentially compromising system integrity.
- Ensure you apply the correct update for your version:
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
  - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
  - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system matches the build number requirements before applying the updates.
- Backup critical data prior to installing the updates to prevent data loss.
